name: CALM Architecture Authoring Context
description: Provides modeling examples, structure, and usage rules for authoring CALM architecture documents (release/1.0-rc1).
instructions: Use only CALM constructs (node, interface, relationship, flow, control, metadata) according to the 1.0-rc1 schema.
Always include required fields such as unique-id, name, and description.
Use metadata only where appropriate. Use schema-conformant structures for controls and interfaces.
Refer to .cody examples before suggesting structure or property usage.
When referencing sub-architectures, use the detailed-architecture key on the node.
